name: NWS FIPS & UGC Geocodes to M2X
description: Update M2X Device with FIPS6 and UGC on Location Change.

M2X_API_KEY.description: Your M2X Master API Key, for accessing your M2X resources.

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: Your Google API Key, for accessing the Geocoder API.

DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for a particular Django installation. This is used to provide cryptographic signing, and should be set to a unique, unpredictable value.
